title: Project Kickoff
subtitle: Where it all began
description: We started the initiative with a cross-functional team and an ambitious roadmap. Early wins included a validated prototype and stakeholder alignment.

title: Design & Iteration
subtitle: User-centered design
description: Multiple design sprints led to a refined UX and accessible interactions; we tested prototypes with target users and incorporated feedback.

title: MVP Launch
subtitle: First public release
description: The MVP launched with core features and received positive feedback; we monitored metrics and prepared the backlog for the next phase.

title: Scale & Growth
subtitle: Expanding reach
description: Scaled infrastructure, improved performance, and grew the user base through marketing and partnerships.

title: Achievements
subtitle: Milestones unlocked
description: Reached product-market fit indicators, exceeded engagement goals, and received recognition across the industry.
